short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overlays a random number of cat pictures at random spots on the current page for maximum cuteness

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Credits to my friend Shel for letting me use pictures of Bernadette

--------------------------------------------
Features:
- Right-click on extension and select "Options" to configure different modes. Default is "Chaos Mode". Note that all cat image overlays are temporary

- Left-clicking on the extension will activate it. One of several cat pictures will be randomly chosen, and various effects (INCLUDING SOUND EFFECTS) will happen to your current page depending on the Extension Mode that you've configured


- Cuteness Overload Mode will spam your screen with a random number of cat pictuersof various random sizes with random border styling on random spots of your current Chrome page for a random amount of time. And you can click it over, and over, and over again, and it'll ADD MORE AND MORE!!!!!!

- Backdrop Mode will overlay your entire Chrome page with a cat picture PERMANENTLY, but you can just click on the extension icon again to remove it :)

- Center Mode will fade in a cat picture at the center of your screen using the default size of the picture... and then fade out the cat... Nothing too fancy there

--------------------------------------------
Permissions:
- activeTab - This extension needs access to your current tab to add image elements overlaying the contents of the page
- storage - This extension uses local and synchronized storage to store this extension's user-configurable options

--------------------------------------------
Notes:
* This extension cannot be used on URLs starting with "chrome://"
* This extension cannot be used within the Chrome webstore
